ygData.subject: Re: Shockwave & Unitron
ygData.msgSnippet: Gemini Dragon heard the scream of Hotrod and then turns around towring over the autobot as he lands. Slowly both heads lean down to level with him about 15

Gemini Dragon heard the scream of Hotrod and then turns around 
towring over the autobot as he lands. Slowly both heads lean down to 
level with him about 15 feet from him. And then without warning the 
right head launches a big blast of flame at him before the left head 
shoots a large ice beam at him.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod/Cleder/Rixer/Forrior/Blyer/Firearm::
> 
> As Shockwave's shots ranged down, all the bots scattered. They all
> avoided the shots, and returned fire. Two shots from each bot.
> Hot Rod was to busy shooting at Shockwave to notice Unitrons shots. 
He
> took several in the left arm.
> "Ahhhhhh!" He screamed in pain, before rolling out of the way. He 
then
> shot two missiles up at Unitron.
> 
> OOC: I wont be back on untill 11:00PM EST. C'ya later!
